addr: Kensington Gore London, Gt Lon SW7 2EU GB
title: FLUX at The Royal College of Art
desc: FLUX Exhibition is the new and exciting event of international contemporary art and performance.? FLUX launched in February 2015 and quickly became established as the event to be at.? Over 70 artists exhibited throughout two rooms at the 5 day event in East London.? FLUX incorporated? live painting , installation and performance to ensure the event was a truly inspirational occasion.? The private evening has been described as ?the best opening night in a decade?? The atmosphere was electric and FLUX buzzed with the enthusiasm of artists and art lovers. ? FLUX aims to bridge the gap between artists and buyers, bringing contemporary art to a wider audience and actively seeking collaborations, commissions and fantastic venues for exhibitions.? The next FLUX will be held at the worlds best art school The Royal College of Art in Kensington.? We will be displaying? work from the most talented contemporary artists and performers ensuring FLUX is a spectacular and immersive experience for art lovers and collectors. Join us on the 10th of December for drinks, incredible art and performance the evening will be a spectacular occasion for art lovers.? Most of the artists will be present on the 10th to discuss their work. All work shown will be for sale.? www.fluxexhibition.com 10th - 14th December 2015
